Crippling Shot.name: Crippling Shot
Crippling Shot.flavor: A blow to the vitals causes your victim to stagger and whimper in pain.
Crippling Shot.attack: Strength vs. Reflex (melee) or Dexterity vs. Reflex (ranged)
Crippling Shot.onHit: 1[W] + Strength modifier damage (melee) or 1[W] + Dexterity modifier damage (ranged), and the target is slowed until the end of your next turn. If the target is a humanoid, it is also weakened until the end of your next turn.

Named Dread.name: Named Dread
Named Dread.flavor: Your name is terror among your humanoid foes.
Named Dread.target: Each humanoid enemy in the burst that can hear you
Named Dread.effect: You speak your name, and the targets take a –2 penalty to attack rolls against you until the end of the encounter. If you’re trained in Intimidate, you also gain combat advantage against the targets until the end of your next turn.

Bleed Away.name: Bleed Away
Bleed Away.flavor: If your adversary fails to give ground under your assault, your wounding blows feed the earth with blood.
Bleed Away.attack: Strength vs. Reflex (melee) or Dexterity vs. Reflex (ranged), three attacks
Bleed Away.onHit: 1[W] + Strength modifier damage (melee) or 1[W] + Dexterity modifier damage (ranged) per attack. You slide the target 2 squares and can shift 2 squares after each hit.
Bleed Away.onMiss: No damage, and you slide the target 1 square and can shift 1 square after each miss.
Bleed Away.effect: The target can negate each slide as a free action, but it then takes ongoing 10 damage (save ends) per square of forced movement negated.
